channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-17088] Refactor RWQueueRpcExecutor/BalancedQueueRpcExecutor/RpcExecutor
item.description:
1. The RWQueueRpcExecutor has eight constructor method and the longest one has ten parameters. But It is only used in SimpleRpcScheduler and easy to confused when read the code.
2. There are duplicate method implement in RWQueueRpcExecutor and BalancedQueueRpcExecutor. They can be implemented in their parent class RpcExecutor.
3. SimpleRpcScheduler read many configs to new RpcExecutor. But the CALL_QUEUE_SCAN_SHARE_CONF_KEY is only needed by RWQueueRpcExecutor. And CALL_QUEUE_CODEL_TARGET_DELAY, CALL_QUEUE_CODEL_INTERVAL and CALL_QUEUE_CODEL_LIFO_THRESHOLD are only needed by AdaptiveLifoCoDelCallQueue.

So I thought we can refactor it. Suggestions are welcome.

Review board: https://reviews.apache.org/r/53726/

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

The timeout ut passed locally. The test timeout because the precommit job oom. And these tests run for a long time. After HBASE-13197, HConnectionManager has been removed and ConnectionImplemention has been a top-level class. I thought we can split TestHCM to some small tests. Now it run almost ten minutes. If the precommit job oom because other ut and TestHCM will be timeout too.
Attach a v3 patch just update the handler thread name.

Guanghao Zhang Could you please prepare a patch for branch-1? Be careful that the BalancedQueueRpcExecutor and RWQueueRpcExecutor and marked as LimitedPrivate to coprocessor and phoenix, so you'd better keep the constructors which is removed in the patch for master in the patch for branch-1 and mark them as deprecated.

Thanks.
Attach patch for branch-1.
Thanks. Marked the old constructors as deprecated in patch for branch-1.
